subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: David Ortiz hit a two-run homer and Daisuke Matsuzaka remained unbeaten on the road helping the Boston Red Sox clinch a tie for the A.L. wild card.
snippet: David Ortiz hit a two-run homer and Daisuke Matsuzaka remained unbeaten on the road helping the Boston Red Sox clinch a tie for the A.L. wild card.
